attributes.action: Stop doing air strikes on Syrian innocent civilians
attributes.additional_details: we want to be proud of this country, let's not stand by and let it happen watching new born babys be pulled from out the rubble and a little boy injured in the back of an ambulance that in shock has no reaction. What would you do if this was your family Isis are the ones to blame not innocent children and family's. maybe the USA and uk government should get some troups on the ground to help them out instead.
attributes.background: We need to stop bombing innocent people in Syria both uk and USA needs to stop what happening is not human and takes affect on everyone seeing innocent children in rubbles of the aftermath of the bombings
